keys_w_o_key2:
In the this part of the top Rows tutorial, we'll learn the use of `keys` `w` and `o`.
Position your left index finger on the left groove on the `key`board, and your right index finger on the right groove of the `key`board. The top row `keys` will be one level above the home row `keys`. With each of your ring fingers, try to reach the `keys` `w` and `o`, and try to remember the movement. Look away from the `key`board and feel the grooves with your fingers and try to find them by moving your fingers away.
Enter the following text once you're comfor`tab`le with the top row `keys` `w` and `o`
